Summary: Light w/aura which appeared to orbit the sun
divs: Sighting DetailsMy Daughter took two of these pics from the ocean beach & the other she found on facebook which was posted the same day. She stated this object circled the sun clockwise in less than 5 min.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Palm Coast
There were no other sightings in Palm Coast on or around April 17th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
